author: GamingBolt
description:
Polyphony's Gran Turismo 7 is over three years old on PS4 and PS5. It arrived amid extensive hype, some controversy over cross-gen releases, and more exclusives for the PS5, but that didn't diminish its gorgeous visuals, incredible realism or extensive selection of cars.

After a brief controversy over progression and monetization, the racing sim has received consistent content updates ever since. New vehicles, World Circuit events, GT Cafe Bonus and Extra Books, more Music Rally tracks, Scapes, the list goes on. Polyphony even added heavily requested features like selling cars and Engine Swaps for select vehicles. It even made the entire game playable in VR for free.

To that end, even though Gran Turismo 7 isn't as old as titles like, say, No Man's Sky, the extent of free post-launch support has been impressive. Despite a few shortcomings, it's the definitive modern racing sim, catering to enthusiasts and newcomers with its range of challenges and cars.
title: Gran Turismo 7 - Is It Worth Playing In 2025?

author: GamingBolt
description:
Death Stranding 2: On the Beach is fast approaching its launch, and as its release draws closer, the excitement surrounding it continues to build. 

Kojima Productions and PlayStations are promising a bevy of improvements over the original game's unique premise that have caught the eye, and as we continue to count the days down to the sequel's release, here, we are going to discuss all of that and more. 

All information in this video is sourced from officially released materials and previously revealed content.
title: Death Stranding 2: On The Beach - 15 Things You Need To Know BEFORE YOU BUY

author: GamingBolt
description: The latest State of Play has just concluded and there were a ton of new announcements. We received new game reveals, release date, gameplay footage and so much more. Here are 10 of the biggest State of Play announcements that stood out to us the most.
title: 10 Biggest Game Reveals And Updates From PlayStation State of Play 2025 That LEFT US SHOCKED
